title: (x) Franklin Pierce University logo w/ unique "P" and "k" - Ela Sans {Jan E}
content:
Anyone recognize the green font in this logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184021im_/http:/typophile.com/files/franklinPierce_3501.gif)

 [‹ It's a girl thing / precious font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184021/http:/typophile.com/node/35855 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fat sans numerals - Cepo {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184021/http:/typophile.com/node/35886 "Go to next forum topic")
author: herrimanjoe

comments.content:
\> The font is Avenir

No, it’s not.
Reliable as always. Good one, Jan. :^)
